title: White Hot Chocolate
ingredients: 3/4 c white baking pieces or chopped white chocolate baking squares
instructions: In medium saucepan combine 1/4 c half-and-half or light cream, the baking pieces, stick cinnamon, and nutmeg. Stir over low heat until baking pieces are melted. Add remaining half-and-half or light cream. Cook and stir until heated through. Remove from heat. Remove stick cinnamon. Add vanilla and almond extract. Makes 5 (6oz) servings.
